alert.note: Alert for Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 9:26AM CDT until April 13 at 9:45AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 AM CDT FOR EASTERN WASHINGTON COUNTY... At 926 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles east of West Fork, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Elkins... West Fork... Greenland... Winslow... Devils Den State Park... Brentwood... Strickler... Drake Field Airport... Blackburn... Goshen... Wyola... Tuttle... Sulphur City... Woolsey... Mayfield... Arnett... Hicks... Hogeye... Odell... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 41 and 62. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
